page.title: 18Churches
page.content: There are a number of churches in our area. Chilcompton has a Church of England, St John's; a Roman Catholic church, St Aldhelm's and a Methodist church. There was also another Church of England, Christ Church, which has closed down. Stratton-on-the-Fosse has a Church of England, St Vigor's (named after a saint who was supposed to have tamed a dragon) and a Catholic Church, St Benedict's. There is also the Catholic Abbey named after St Gregory. Lots of monks live there. There are Sunday services in all the churches. Confession is held in the R.C. churches on Saturday. The Church of England Rector has to travel between the two villages to lead aervices in both churches. The Family Services are well attended.
